mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class(class_name, class_explain, teacher_idx, class_total_time, class_total_lesson_count, class_image_original_filename, class_image_saved_filename) VALUES(#{className}, #{classExplain}, #{teacherIdx}, #{classTotalTime}, #{classTotalLessonCount}, #{classImageOriginalFilename}, #{classImageSavedFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM class WHERE teacher_idx = #{teacherIdx} ORDER BY teacher_idx DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, 10
